name: GroHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom light”
”Alexa, set bedroom light to 50 percent”
”Alexa, dim bedroom light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the GroHome skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your GroHome devices by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your GroHome account and discover your devices. 

When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names:
Use the names you previously set up. They are shown in the GroHome app and can be changed.
Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group. 
Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following:
"Alexa, turn on Bedroom."
"Alexa, set bedroom light to 50 percent."

If you have any questions, please email growatt2016@163.com to contact us.
